titleStmt.title: The Scots constancy. Or, An answer to Cleveland's Scots apostacy.
titleStmt.author: Bostock, Robert, d. 1656.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Bostock by Wing.

Annotation on Thomason copy: on page 1: "Aprill 1st 1647"; "Written by Robin Bostock Stationer"; page 2, line 26: 'his' crossed out and replaced by to "tis"; page 4, line 20, 'pretend' crossed out and replaced by "speak faire".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
